description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Annals of Newtown in Queen's County, New York, containing its history from its first settlement, together with many interesting facts concerning the adjacent towns; also a particular account of numerous Long Island Families, etc" Author: RIKER, James. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10412.d.11." Page: 339 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1852 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003104654 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
